mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM GACHA_ADD_SUGGEST WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT S.id , S.status , S.content , S.file_id , F.file_url , S.admin_comment , S.receive_email_yn , S.requested_at , S.processed_at FROM GACHA_ADD_SUGGEST S LEFT JOIN ( SELECT file_id , file_url , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY file_id ORDER BY created_at ASC) AS row_num FROM IMAGE_FILE ) F ON F.file_id = S.file_id AND F.row_num = 1 WHERE S.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY S.requested_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT S.id , S.user_id , U.nickname , S.status , S.content , S.file_id , F.file_url , S.admin_comment , S.receive_email_yn , S.requested_at , S.processed_at FROM GACHA_ADD_SUGGEST S INNER JOIN USER U ON U.id = S.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT file_id , file_url , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY file_id ORDER BY created_at ASC) AS row_num FROM IMAGE_FILE ) F ON F.file_id = S.file_id AND F.row_num = 1 ORDER BY S.requested_at DESC
